page.title: 07Shoreham Beach Infant Schl.
page.content: The school was built in 1972,and is situated on ground level. It has one hall,three classrooms,a library, kitchen and dining room. The school has an age range of 5-8 years. 94 pupils and 4 teachers attend this school. The school takes in about 24 new pupils a year. The school uniform is optional but is preferred to be worn. School begins at 9am and finishes at 3pm. The day is broken up by breaktime in the morning lasting 20 minutes followed by the lunch hour,then the breaktime in the afternoon lasting 15 minutes. There is no set timetable and there is no bell to signify the end of one lesson and the beginning of the next. Instead sessions are held. The headmistress started out as a dance teacher,but came to Beach School
